description: [``botocore``] This releases adds support for Custom Prompt Router
[``botocore``] IVS Real-Time now offers customers the ability to merge fragmented recordings in the event of a participant disconnect.

[``botocore``] This release contains 2 changes. 1: DeleteScope/GetScope/UpdateScope operations now return 404 instead of 500 when the resource does not exist. 2: Expected string format for clientToken fields of CreateMonitorInput/CreateScopeInput/UpdateMonitorInput have been updated to be an UUID based string.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for ListStatements API to filter statements by ClusterIdentifier, WorkgroupName, and Database.
[``botocore``] You can now perform an exact match or rate limit aggregation against the web request's JA4 fingerprint.
[``botocore``] Added a new ModifyEndpointEncryptionMode API for managing endpoint encryption settings.
